info: Began tracking in 1994 after discovering Scream Tracker 3. Jumped to Impulse tracker in the following years. Formed the group Collapse in 2002 with other coders and graphic artists and created a bunch of popular productions such as "Digital Behaviours" and "Illuminata". Also composed the music for famous productions from XPLSV, such as "Envolvente" and "Sound Pressure", and RGBA's "Paradise is coming 64K".
